content.text:
Just to clarify from the other thread, my thinking went like this:

1. saw the playlist when it was posted, thought "non-violent communication" sounded interesting
2. watched a few videos yesterday and liked some of the ideas, had a similar experience as [@noffle](@C3iYh/12sO1uvKq1KcZXLFxSySzxOkHxXN8rtNB5MGA=.ed25519)
3. saw *the other thread* and thought it might be a solid opportunity to apply the lens
4. remembered some beef about *the phone call* where some "therapy technique" was used IIRC
5. wanted to be super up front about the fact that I was trying out a different lens than usual
6. read the post above re: "weaponized NVC" and had an "oh shit" moment

I'm not sure whether my behavior was actually even different or whether *the phone call beef* was about NVC, but regardless I should probably have been a bit more considerate before trying out a new pair of brain goggles. I'd love to hear more about different experiences with NVC, both positive and negative, as I've never heard about it before this thread.
